SELECT CASE WHEN MOD(COUNT(1),#{pageRowInfo}) > 0 THEN FLOOR(COUNT(1)/#{pageRowInfo}) + 1 ELSE FLOOR(COUNT(1)/#{pageRowInfo}) END PAGE_TOTAL_CNT FROM BBS_POST, IRON_USER WHERE BBS_POST.BBS_POST_STATUS = 'N' AND BBS_POST.BBS_POST_REG_ID = IRON_USER.USER_ID(+)
AND BBS_CATAL_ID = #{bbsCatalId}
AND ( BBS_POST.BBS_POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{selAllKey} || '%' OR BBS_POST.BBS_POST_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{selAllKey} || '%' )
AND ( BBS_POST.BBS_POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{selSrcKey} || '%' OR BBS_POST.BBS_POST_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{selSrcKey} || '%' OR BBS_POST.BBS_POST_REG_ID LIKE '%' || #{selSrcKey} || '%' )
AND ( BBS_POST.BBS_POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{selSrcKey} || '%' OR BBS_POST.BBS_POST_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{selSrcKey} || '%' )
AND IRON_USER.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{selSrcKey} || '%'

/* queryId = selectPostInfo */
SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, BBS_CATAL_ID, BBS_POST_ID, BBS_POST_TITLE, BBS_POST_CONTENT, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BBS_REPLE WHERE BBS_REPLE.BBS_POST_ID = BBS_POST.BBS_POST_ID AND BBS_REPLE.BBS_REPLE_DEL_STAT = 'N') AS POST_REPLE_CNT, BBS_POST_REG_DATE, BBS_POST_REG_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM IRON_USER WHERE USER_ID = BBS_POST_REG_ID) AS BBS_POST_REG_NM, BBS_POST_MOD_DATE, BBS_POST_MOD_ID, BBS_POST_STATUS FROM BBS_POST WHERE BBS_POST_STATUS = 'N' AND BBS_POST_ID = #{bbsPostId}

/* queryId = insertPostAttach */
INSERT INTO BBS_ATTACH( BBS_POST_ID, BBS_ATTACH_ID, BBS_ATTACH_SN, BBS_ATTACH_LOC, BBS_ATTACH_SAVE_NM, BBS_ATTACH_ORIGIN_NM, BBS_ATTACH_REG_DT, BBS_ATTACH_REG_ID ) SELECT #{bbsPostId} AS BBS_POST_ID, ('POST_AT' || NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(BBS_ATTACH_ID),8,8), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) || CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MAX(BBS_ATTACH_ID),16,3) IS NULL THEN '001' ELSE LPAD(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(BBS_ATTACH_ID),16,3))+1), 3, '0') END ) AS BBS_ATTACH_ID, (NVL(MAX(BBS_ATTACH_SN), 0) + 1) AS BBS_ATTACH_SN, #{bbsAttachLoc} AS BBS_ATTACH_LOC, #{bbsAttachSaveNm} AS BBS_ATTACH_SAVE_NM, #{bbsAttachOriginNm} AS BBS_ATTACH_ORIGIN_NM, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS BBS_ATTACH_REG_DT, #{bbsPostRegId} AS BBS_ATTACH_REG_ID FROM BBS_ATTACH WHERE SUBSTR(BBS_ATTACH_ID, 8, 8) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')

/* queryId = insertRepleInfo */
INSERT INTO BBS_REPLE( BBS_POST_ID, BBS_REPLE_ID, BBS_REPLE_CONTENT, BBS_REPLE_REG_DATE, BBS_REPLE_REG_ID, BBS_REPLE_MOD_DATE, BBS_REPLE_MOD_ID, BBS_REPLE_DEL_STAT ) SELECT #{bbsPostId} AS BBS_POST_ID, ('BR' || NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(BBS_REPLE_ID),3,8), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) || CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MAX(BBS_REPLE_ID),11,3) IS NULL THEN '001' ELSE LPAD(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(BBS_REPLE_ID),11,13))+1), 3, '0') END ) AS BBS_REPLE_ID, #{bbsRepleContent} AS BBS_REPLE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS BBS_REPLE_REG_DATE, #{bbsRepleRegId} AS BBS_REPLE_REG_ID, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS BBS_REPLE_MOD_DATE, #{bbsRepleRegId} AS BBS_REPLE_MOD_ID, 'N' AS BBS_REPLE_DEL_STAT FROM BBS_REPLE WHERE SUBSTR(BBS_REPLE_ID, 3, 8) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')

/* queryId = selectUserPostViewCnt */
INSERT INTO BBS_VIEWS( BBS_VIEW_ID, BBS_POST_ID, BBS_POST_VIEW_USER_ID, BBS_POST_VIEW_DATE ) SELECT ('BV' || NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(BBS_VIEW_ID),3,8), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) || CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MAX(BBS_VIEW_ID),11,6) IS NULL THEN '000001' ELSE LPAD(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(BBS_VIEW_ID),11,16))+1), 6, '0') END ) AS BBS_VIEW_ID, #{bbsPostId} AS BBS_POST_ID, #{userId} AS BBS_POST_VIEW_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS BBS_POST_VIEW_DATE FROM BBS_VIEWS WHERE SUBSTR(BBS_VIEW_ID, 3, 8) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
